name: CategoryTheory.isFiltered_of_representablyCoflat
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
D : Type u₂
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} D
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.IsFiltered D
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.RepresentablyCoflat F
⊢ CategoryTheory.IsFiltered C
decl:
lemma isFiltered_of_representablyCoflat [IsFiltered D] [RepresentablyCoflat F] : IsFiltered C :=
  isFiltered_of_isFiltered_costructuredArrow F (𝟭 _)

name: CategoryTheory.isCofiltered_of_representablyFlat
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
D : Type u₂
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} D
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.IsCofiltered D
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.RepresentablyFlat F
⊢ CategoryTheory.IsCofiltered C
decl:
lemma isCofiltered_of_representablyFlat [IsCofiltered D] [RepresentablyFlat F] :
    IsCofiltered C := by
  have := isFiltered_of_representablyCoflat F.op
  exact isCofiltered_of_isFiltered_op C
